Will this have a bay that will open and will there be an IVA?

Yes, the bay will open. For IVA, we don't have a modeler to do that, so not in 5.0, unfortunately. Of course, if anybody wants to make such an IVA, feel free to PM Cepheus or me. Also, I've got no idea when this will be done, it depends on factors beyond my control.
so we're not allowed to post images?

Is this the NASA model? From what I know, it's not really suitable for use in KSP.

Is this the NASA model? From what I know, it's not really suitable for use in KSP.

nope! Its not the nasa model

Where is it from, then? Did you model it yourself? I'd say that a model expert would come in handy for the project. We have a decent ET and amazing SRBs (from BobCat, no less), but the shuttle model itself is a bit bugged. That's the biggest hurdle right now. If it wasn't for those model issues, it'd be possible to release the CSS right now.

Thank you for answering my above question that I inquired about from Cepheus before I was rudely told to stop asking! Which by the way was the only time I asked. I'll just make my own shuttle addon thanks!

Edited June 23, 2013 by Redneck

Thank you for answering my above question that I inquired about from Cepheus before I was rudely told to stop asking! Which by the way was the only time I asked. I'll just make my own shuttle addon thanks!

The point is, it's a bit rude to ask a modder about ETA. He'll release his mod when it's releasable, not before, not after, just when it's releasable. And they often don't even know when it'll be ready.
